devotionals.title: The Daily Flame: 365 Days of Eternal Light
devotionals.description: A year-long journey of daily reflections combining scripture, prayer, and practical wisdom. Each day ignites your faith with powerful meditations designed to bring clarity, peace, and purpose to your spiritual walk.
devotionals.longDescription: Transform your mornings with The Daily Flame, a comprehensive 365-day devotional that guides you through scripture with fresh perspective and actionable insights. Each entry includes: a scripture passage, reflective meditation, practical application, and prayer prompt. Perfect for busy entrepreneurs, ministry leaders, and anyone seeking deeper connection with their faith.

devotionals.title: Radiant Faith: 40 Days of Breakthrough
devotionals.description: A 40-day intensive devotional designed for spiritual warriors seeking breakthrough in business, relationships, and purpose. Combines powerful prayers, biblical wisdom, and strategic declarations.
devotionals.longDescription: Radiant Faith is not just a devotionalâ€”it's a strategic spiritual blueprint for breakthrough. Over 40 days, you'll engage with focused prayers, scripture declarations, and faith-building exercises that target specific areas: financial breakthrough, relationship healing, clarity of purpose, and overcoming obstacles. Includes bonus audio prayers and worship playlist.

devotionals.title: Sacred Business Blueprint: Faith Meets Enterprise
devotionals.description: A 30-day devotional for Christian entrepreneurs blending biblical principles with business strategy. Learn to build kingdom-driven enterprises with integrity, wisdom, and divine guidance.
devotionals.longDescription: Sacred Business Blueprint bridges the gap between faith and entrepreneurship. Each of the 30 days covers essential topics: stewardship, ethical leadership, profit with purpose, hiring with wisdom, serving customers excellently, and building legacy businesses. Includes scripture-based business principles, real-world case studies, prayer strategies for business decisions, and action plans.

journals.title: The Covenant Journal: Daily Reflections & Prayers
journals.description: A beautifully designed guided journal with 6 months of daily prompts, scripture spaces, gratitude tracking, and prayer logs. Perfect for deepening your spiritual practice.
journals.longDescription: The Covenant Journal provides structure and inspiration for your daily quiet time. Each week includes: guided scripture reflection prompts, gratitude exercises, answered prayer tracking, personal growth metrics, and space for free-form journaling. Available in digital PDF (printable) or physical hardcover edition.

journals.title: Entrepreneur's Faith Journal: Business & Belief
journals.description: A 90-day guided journal specifically designed for Christian entrepreneurs. Track business goals, spiritual growth, and find balance between ambition and faith.
journals.longDescription: The Entrepreneur's Faith Journal helps you integrate your business journey with your spiritual life. Each day includes: business goal tracking, revenue/metrics logging, leadership reflection prompts, scripture for entrepreneurs, prayer spaces for business decisions, and work-life-faith balance assessments. Includes quarterly review pages and vision board templates.

journals.title: Gratitude & Grace: 52 Weeks of Thankfulness
journals.description: A year-long gratitude journal with weekly themes, daily prompts, and space to record blessings. Cultivate a heart of thanksgiving and watch your faith flourish.
journals.longDescription: Gratitude & Grace transforms your perspective through intentional thankfulness. Each week features a unique theme (provision, relationships, health, favor, etc.) with daily prompts designed to help you recognize God's goodness in every area of life. Includes monthly gratitude summaries, answered prayer celebrations, and reflection exercises.

bundles.title: Complete Faith Entrepreneur Bundle
bundles.description: Everything you need to build a faith-driven business! Includes Sacred Business Blueprint devotional, Entrepreneur's Faith Journal, plus bonus resources: business prayer guide, scripture cards, and goal-setting workbook.
bundles.longDescription: The Faith Entrepreneur Bundle is your complete toolkit for building a kingdom-driven enterprise. Get the Sacred Business Blueprint (30-day devotional), Entrepreneur's Faith Journal (90 days), plus exclusive bonuses: Business Prayer & Fasting Guide, 50 Scripture Cards for Entrepreneurs (printable), Strategic Goal-Setting Workbook, and access to private community forum. Save $28 compared to buying separately.

bundles.title: Ultimate Devotional Collection
bundles.description: All three devotionals in one powerful collection! Daily Flame (365 days), Radiant Faith (40 days), and Sacred Business Blueprint (30 days). Plus bonus audio content and workbooks.
bundles.longDescription: Get the entire devotional library and save big! This collection includes The Daily Flame (365 days), Radiant Faith (40 days breakthrough), and Sacred Business Blueprint (30 days). You'll receive over 400 days of guided devotions, audio prayer tracks, companion workbooks, and lifetime access. Perfect for individuals or small group study.
